# Yantra4D - The Hyperobjects Commons

This is an AI-readable endpoint containing key ecosystem locations to accelerate developer context parsing for Yantra4D.

## Architecture
- `apps/studio`: The main React 19 / Vite frontend application utilizing Monaco and Drei for rendering parameterized `.scad` documents on the fly.
- `apps/docs`: This repository (Astro Starlight).
- `projects/`: The 4D Commons directory holding the `project.json` schemas mapped to `*.scad` and `*.py` files governing rendering logic.

## Tools
You can find further LLM reading materials directly in the monorepo root: `/llms.txt` and `/llms-full.txt`.
